descriptionHtml:
[color=#add8e6][b]What It Is[/b]
 
Creates a wearable item that doesn't use any equipment slots
that grants the visual effect of Boethiah's Ebony Armor that is
awarded to the player upon completion of her Daedric quest.
Vampires are immune to the sun while wearing her cloak and
the visual effect can be constant (depending on the file).
Now with full Vampire Lord support!

[/color][color=#add8e6]The original version now also has a spellbook included with the
cloak. This teaches a castable version of the cloak but it does
not have the same SPF rating as the cloak and vampires will
still have their troubles with sunlight while using the castable spell.
The effect lasts for about a minute of real time.[/color]

[i]A perfect exterior for your dark and brooding interior.[/i]
 
[color=#99ffcc][b]What It Isn't[/b]
 
Unlike the Daedric Artifact the default file does not include
the silent movement or poison cloak damage effect.  The
Artifact is also only active while you are sneaking - this one
is always on, baby.[/color]
 
[color=#ffff99][b]Where it Is[/b]
 
At Boethiah's Sacellum, on the other side of the Pillar of
Sacrifice is a cauldron. The cloak is lying at the bottom
of the cauldron.[/color]
 
[b]Optional Files[/b]
 
You may also choose to download the Silent version which
retains the 100% muffle of the Daedric Artifact or the
Sneaking version which reverts to only active while sneaking
like the Daedric Artifact.  Download one or the other, the .esp's
are named identically to help prevent mistakes.  If you change
which version you are using, simply overwrite any files.
 
And Vanilla Skyrim versions for those without Dawnguard.

[color=#d3d3d3][b]Manual Installation[/b]
 
Extract the .esp and .bsa to your Steam>steamapps>common>Skyrim>Data folder.

[b]Manual Uninstallation[/b]

Remove the .esp and the .bsa[/color]
 
[color=#ffa07a][b]Bugs[/b]
[/color][list][color=#ffa07a]
[/color][*][color=#ffa07a][s]Dawnguard version not working as intended, removed[/s][/color]
[color=#ffa07a][s]until fixed[/s] - [/color][url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/topic/6690-solved-vampirism-sun-weakness-change-with-your-gear/][color=#33ccff]Forum Thread[/color][/url] - After only [b][size=2]FOUR DAYS[/size][/b] fix't![/list]
[color=#cc99ff][b]Future Development[/b]

[/color][list][color=#cc99ff]
[/color][*][color=#cc99ff]Complete a possibly radiant quest to send you to search[/color]
[color=#cc99ff]for and restore the cloak - [/color][url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/topic/6712-wipz-boethiahs-cloak/][color=#33ccff]Development Thread[/color][/url][/list]
[b]Compatibility[/b]

Dawnguard versions will not be compatible with any mods that modify these files -
[list][*][i]DLC1VampireChangeEffect[/i]
[*][i]DLC1RevertEffect[/i]
[/list]Also available on [url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1613-boethiahs-cloak/][color=#33ccff]TES Alliance[/color][/url] and [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=474196325][color=#33ccff]Steam Workshop[/color][/url] and [url=http://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/files/file/1037-boethiahs-cloak/][color=#33ccff]AFK Mods[/color][/url]
author: Sulhir

files.name: Vanilla Silent
files.changelogHtml:
Repackaged files that were incorrectly packed for the mod manager.
Converted Dawnguard files to a .BSA format to make installation and uninstallation easier.
